channel.title: Topic 06: Modern Convolutional Neural Networks) on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)
channel.description: Recent content in Topic 06: Modern Convolutional Neural Networks) on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)

item.title: Chapter 06.01: 1D/ 2D/ 3D Convolutions
item.description: We describe convolution operation for different types of data.

item.title: Chapter 06.02: Important Types of Convolutions
item.description: Dilated Convolutions and Transposed Convolutions are two important types of CNNs that we introduce them in this section and describe the advantage and problem which they addressed.

item.title: Chapter 06.03: Separable Convolutions and Flattening
item.description: In this section, we explain separable CNNs and Flattening.

item.title: Chapter 06.04: Modern Convolutional Architecture - Part1
item.description: In this section, we explain the recent popular CNN-based architecture.

item.title: Chapter 06.05: Modern Convolutional Architecture - Part2
item.description: In this section, we explain the recent popular CNN-based architecture.

item.title: Chapter 06.06: Adversarial Robustness and Examples
item.description: Adversarial machine learning studies techniques which attempt to fool machine learning models through malicious input, we explain adversarial examples and adversarial training in this section.
